bibl.title: Graeco-Roman Archives from the Fayum

series.title: Collectanea Hellenistica - KVAB [Koninklijke Vlaamse Academie van België voor Wetenschappen en Kunsten, Comité Klassieke Studies, Subcomité Hellenisme]

bibl.note: Present 145 reconstructed archives originating from the Fayum, including private, professional, official and temple archives both in Greek and in native Demotic.
bibl.seg: Katelijn Vandorpe, Willy Clarysse & Herbert Verreth, with contributions by Giuseppina Azzarello, Yanne Broux, Marie-Pierre Chaufray, W. Graham Claytor, Lucia Criscuolo, Birgit Feucht, Karolien Geens, Francisca A.J. Hoogendijk, Ruben Smolders, Silke Vanbeselaere, Bart Van Beek, Korneel Van Lommel, Sofie Waebens, Graeco-Roman Archives from the Fayum = Collectanea Hellenistica - KVAB [Koninklijke Vlaamse Academie van België voor Wetenschappen en Kunsten, Comité Klassieke Studies, Subcomité Hellenisme]. VI.
Leuven - Paris - Bristol, CT, Peeters, 2015, 4°, 496 pp., nombr. tabl., diagrammes, figg., 1 carte. ISBN 978-90-429-3162-6. €105.
Present 145 reconstructed archives originating from the Fayum, including private, professional, official and temple archives both in Greek and in native Demotic.
Vandorpe Clarysse Verreth Azzarello Broux Chaufray Claytor Criscuolo Feucht Geens Hoogendijk Smolders Vanbeselaere Van Beek Van Lommel Waebens
